table_description: Information about the current user making the request.

columns.name: username
columns.description: Username (actually often in ID style) of the user.

columns.name: modified_on
columns.description: When the user was last modified.

columns.name: two_factor_authentication_enabled
columns.description: True if two factor authentication is enabled for this user.

columns.name: betas
columns.description: Beta feature flags associated with the user.

columns.name: organizations
columns.description: Organizations the user is a member of.
